column1: #### Pb isotope ratio values for mineral samples collected near Ny-Ålesund
#### pb20x20y should be read as 20xPb/ 20yPb. U columns provide an estimate of measurement uncertainty at 95-confidence level
#### Missing values are reported as NA.

#### Bazzano2014: Bazzano, A., Rivaro, P., Soggia, F., Ardini, F., Grotti, M., 2014. Anthropogenic and natural sources of particulate trace elements in the coastal marine environment of Kongsfjorden, Svalbard. Mar. Chem. 163, 28–35. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.marchem.2014.04.001

#### Grotti2017: Grotti, M., Soggia, F., Ardini, F., Bazzano, A., Moroni, B., Vivani, R., Cappelletti, D., Misic, C., 2017. Trace elements in surface sediments from Kongsfjorden, Svalbard: occurrence, sources and bioavailability. International Journal of Environmental Analytical Chemistry 0, 1–18. https://doi.org/10.1080/03067319.2017.1317762
